description: The Work Source DeKalb Mobile Career Center will be stationed throughout the county during April, from Decatur to Lithonia.
title: 13 ways to find out who's hiring in DeKalb this month
title_page: 13 ways to find out who's hiring in DeKalb this month
text:
The Work Source DeKalb Mobile Career Center will be stationed throughout the county during April, from Decatur to Lithonia.
The unit provides residents with job search assistance, adult workshops and training, resume writing and interviewing tips. Businesses can also use it for recruiting, pre-employment screenings, interviewing and training.
The dates for this month are:
Monday, April 10, 10 a.m. - 4 p.m.

215 Sycamore St.
Decatur, 30030
